content: this sweet crochet carrots garland will add a touch of spring to your home string the carrots as a bunting or use them as a fun decoration for your easter table you could even use them to dress up your easter baskets fast and easy to make the 2d style pieces two flat panels stuffed and joined together can be used on their own or paired with my easter bunny garland can also be found on ravelry - sold separately for even more easter fun this is a perfect project for scrap yarn as each carrot only uses 30-40 yarns of worsted weight yarn you ll also need a size g hook a small amount of dk weight yarn for the details and a little bit of stuffing material instructions are given for stringing this garland with jute twine or yarn the pattern includes detailed written instructions suitable for a confident beginner and a step-by-step photo tutorial browse my ravelry designs to find garland patterns for every season visit www knottednest com for the free version of this pattern pattern download - pattern is written in us terms - pattern includes written instructions and step-by-step pictures skill level easy - level 2 this pattern requires increasing/decreasing some sewing and joining panels together sizing each carrot measures about 9 tall including stems x 3 wide finished garland as written measures about 70 share your work follow along on instagram at @theknottednest tag @theknottednest and use the #crochetcarrotgarland hashtag to show off your new project copyright the crochet carrot garland pattern and photographs are property of the knotted nest and are for personal non-commercial use only you may not alter share or sell this pattern in any way however you are welcome to sell the finished product that you make using this pattern please credit the knotted nest by including a link to the pattern listing if selling the finished piece online
